verses.roman:
tumi saba karite pāra gamanāgamana
gaṅgā-snāne kabhu habe tāṅra āgamana

synonyms: tumi—you; saba—all; karite—to do; pāra—are able; gamana-āgamana—going and coming; gaṅgā-snāne—for bathing in the Ganges; kabhu—sometimes; habe—it will be possible; tāṅra—His; āgamana—coming here.
translation: "All you devotees will be able to come and go, and sometimes He may also come to take His bath in the Ganges.
